short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension to place a sticky image in an active tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Image Pin allows you to place images over the website you're currently browsing. You can drag, resize and clear the image.

How to use:
- make a screenshot using in-build application in your Operating System or copy and image
- click on Image Pin browser extension icon
- paste your image (Ctrl + V on Windows, Command + V on Mac)

Feature set is currently limited, contact me if you find this useful and would like to see more features. Cheers!
